resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76045</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76045</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ab0282e8-12a2-11d8-9145-d64dc9453a34#1#10</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A nagy földrajzi felfedezések</string>
            <string language="en">The great geographical discoveries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die großen geographischen Entdeckungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les grandes découvertes géographiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As descobertas geográficas grandes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le scoperte geografiche grandi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μεγάλες γεωγραφικές ανακαλύψεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los grandes descubrimientos geográficos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A nagy földrajzi felfedezések előzményei, térképészeti és hajózási feltételei, fontosabb eseményei</string>
            <string language="en">The antecedents, cartographical and shipping conditions and important events of the great geographical discoveries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hajó,  Kolumbusz,  iránytű,  </string>
            <string language="en">Ship, Columbus, compass</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Vorgeschichte, kartographischen und 
Verschiffendie bedingungen und die wichtigen Fälle der großen 
geographischen Entdeckungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les antécédents, les conditions cartographiques 
et d'expédition et les événements importants des grandes 
découvertes géographiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os antecedentess, as condições cartographical e 
de transporte e os eventos importantes das descobertas geográficas 
grandes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli antecedenti, le condizioni di spedizione e 
cartografiche e gli eventi importanti delle scoperte geografiche 
grandi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα προηγούμενα, οι χαρτογραφικοί και όροι ναυτιλίας 
και τα σημαντικά γεγονότα των μεγάλων γεωγραφικών ανακαλύψεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los antecedentes, las condiciones cartográficas 
y de envío y los acontecimientos importantes de los grandes 
descubrimientos geográficos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schiff, Columbus, Kompaß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bateau, Columbus, boussole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Navio, Columbo, compasso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nave, Columbus, bussola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκάφος, Columbus, πυξίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nave, Columbus, compás</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">15-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76045</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=ab0282e8-12a2-11d8-9145-d64dc9453a34&v=1&b=10</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
